languages.text: "Пусть празднуют свою незначимую победу. Им неведомо, что Истина уже восторжествовала, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Eufrates_ChampionOfChaos}породив могучего чемпиона{/d}". {n}Незримый для всех, кроме вас, образ Уралона окидывает взором два худощавых женских тела в алых робах, лежащих на полу.{/n} "Удел слабых — устилать своими никчемными жизнями тропы сильных, по которым они восходят на престол".

"Let them celebrate their trifling victory. Little do they know that the Truth has already triumphed, in {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Eufrates_ChampionOfChaos}bringing forth a mighty champion{/d}." {n}Unseen to anyone but you, Uralon's image surveys the bodies of two lean, scarlet-robed women lying on the floor.{/n} "The lot of the weak is to lay down their worthless lives to pave the way for the strong to ascend their thrones."
languages.original_text: "Пусть празднуют свою незначимую победу. Им неведомо, что Истина уже восторжествовала, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Eufrates_ChampionOfChaos}породив могучего чемпиона{/d}". {n}Незримый для всех, кроме вас, образ Уралона окидывает взором два худощавых женских тела в алых робах, лежащих на полу.{/n} "Удел слабых — устилать своими никчемными жизнями тропы сильных, по которым они восходят на престол".

traits.locale_text: "Let them celebrate their insignificant victory. Little do they know that the Truth has already triumphed, in bringing forth a mighty champion." {n}Unseen to anyone but you, Uralon's image surveys the bodies of two lean scarlet-robed women that are lying on the floor.{/n} "The lot of the weak is to lay down their worthless lives to pave the way for the strong to ascend to their thrones."
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

Little do they know that the Truth has already triumphed, in {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Eufrates_ChampionOfChaos}bringing forth a mighty champion{/d}." {n}Unseen to anyone but you, Uralon's image surveys the bodies of two lean, scarlet-robed women lying on the floor.{/n} "The lot of the weak is to lay down their worthless lives to pave the way for the strong to ascend their thrones."
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

languages.text: “就让他们庆祝他们小小的胜利吧。他们根本不知道，真理已经取得了胜利，{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Eufrates_ChampionOfChaos}带来了一位伟大的勇士{/d}。”{n}乌拉隆的幻象审视着地板上那两个穿着红色长袍的瘦削女人的尸体。除了你之外，谁都看不见这样的景象。{/n}“弱者的命运便是放弃毫无价值的生命，为强者铺平登上王位的道路。”
languages.original_text: "Let them celebrate their trifling victory. Little do they know that the Truth has already triumphed, in {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Eufrates_ChampionOfChaos}bringing forth a mighty champion{/d}." {n}Unseen to anyone but you, Uralon's image surveys the bodies of two lean, scarlet-robed women lying on the floor.{/n} "The lot of the weak is to lay down their worthless lives to pave the way for the strong to ascend their thrones."

traits.locale_text: “就让他们庆祝他们小小的胜利吧。他们根本不知道，真理已经取得了胜利，带来了一位伟大的战士。”{n}乌拉隆的幻象审视着地板上那两个穿着红色长袍的瘦削女人的尸体。除了你之外，谁都看不见这样的景象。{/n}“弱者的命运便是放弃毫无价值的生命，为强者铺平登上王位的道路。”
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

languages.text: "Lasst sie ihren unbedeutenden Sieg feiern. Sie wissen nicht, dass die Wahrheit bereits triumphiert hat und {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Eufrates_ChampionOfChaos}einen mächtigen Champion hervorgebracht hat{/d}." {n}Von allen außer dir unbemerkt scannt Uralon die Leichen der beiden schlanken Frauen in den roten Roben, die auf dem Bild liegen.{/n} "Das Los der Schwachen ist es, ihre wertlosen Leben niederzulegen, um den Starken den Weg zum Thron zu ebnen."
languages.original_text: "Let them celebrate their trifling victory. Little do they know that the Truth has already triumphed, in {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Eufrates_ChampionOfChaos}bringing forth a mighty champion{/d}." {n}Unseen to anyone but you, Uralon's image surveys the bodies of two lean, scarlet-robed women lying on the floor.{/n} "The lot of the weak is to lay down their worthless lives to pave the way for the strong to ascend their thrones."

traits.locale_text: "Lasst sie ihren unbedeutenden Sieg feiern. Sie wissen nicht, dass die Wahrheit bereits triumphiert hat und einen mächtigen Champion hervorgebracht hat." {n}Von allen außer dir unbemerkt scannt Uralon die Leichen der beiden schlanken Frauen in den roten Roben, die auf dem Bild liegen.{/n} "Das Los der Schwachen ist es, ihre wertlosen Leben niederzulegen, um den Starken den Weg zum Thron zu ebnen."
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

languages.text: «Que celebren su pírrica victoria. No se imaginan que la Verdad ya ha triunfado con la {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Eufrates_ChampionOfChaos}llegada de su formidable adalid{/d}». {n}La imagen de Uralon, que solamente tú puedes ver, examina los cadáveres de dos mujeres delgadas ataviadas con túnicas escarlata que yacen en el suelo.{/n} «El destino de los débiles es dar sus insignificantes vidas para alfombrar el camino de los fuertes en su ascenso al trono».
languages.original_text: "Let them celebrate their trifling victory. Little do they know that the Truth has already triumphed, in {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Eufrates_ChampionOfChaos}bringing forth a mighty champion{/d}." {n}Unseen to anyone but you, Uralon's image surveys the bodies of two lean, scarlet-robed women lying on the floor.{/n} "The lot of the weak is to lay down their worthless lives to pave the way for the strong to ascend their thrones."

traits.locale_text: «Que celebren su pírrica victoria. No se imaginan que la Verdad ya ha triunfado con la llegada de su formidable adalid». {n}La imagen de Uralon, que solamente tú puedes ver, examina los cadáveres de dos mujeres delgadas ataviadas con túnicas escarlata que yacen en el suelo.{/n} «El destino de los débiles es dar sus insignificantes vidas para alfombrar el camino de los fuertes en su ascenso al trono».
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

languages.text: « Qu'ils célèbrent leur insignifiante victoire. Ils ignorent que la vérité à déjà triomphé et {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Eufrates_ChampionOfChaos}produit {mf|un puissant champion|une puissante championne}{/d}. »{n}Vous {mf|seul|seule} voyez que l'image d'Uralon observe les corps de deux femmes aux robes rouges étendues au sol.{/n} « Tel est le sort des faibles : donner leur vie sans valeur pour permettre aux puissants d'accéder à leur trône. »
languages.original_text: "Let them celebrate their trifling victory. Little do they know that the Truth has already triumphed, in {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Eufrates_ChampionOfChaos}bringing forth a mighty champion{/d}." {n}Unseen to anyone but you, Uralon's image surveys the bodies of two lean, scarlet-robed women lying on the floor.{/n} "The lot of the weak is to lay down their worthless lives to pave the way for the strong to ascend their thrones."

traits.locale_text: « Qu'ils célèbrent leur insignifiante victoire. Ils ignorent que la vérité à déjà triomphé et produit {mf|un puissant champion|une puissante championne}. » {n}Vous {mf|seul|seule} voyez que l'image d'Uralon observe les corps de deux femmes aux robes rouges étendues au sol.{/n} « Tel est le sort des faibles : donner leur vie sans valeur pour permettre aux puissants d'accéder à leur trône. »
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

languages.text: 「少しばかりの勝利を祝わせてやろう。真理がすでに勝利し、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Eufrates_ChampionOfChaos}強大な王者を生み出した{/d}ことを、彼女らは知らない」{n}あなた以外には見えないが、ウラロンのイメージは床に倒れている二人の痩せた緋色の衣をまとった女性の遺体を調べている。{/n}「弱者は価値のない命を投げ出して、強者が王座に就くための道を開く運命にあるってことだ」
languages.original_text: "Let them celebrate their trifling victory. Little do they know that the Truth has already triumphed, in {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Eufrates_ChampionOfChaos}bringing forth a mighty champion{/d}." {n}Unseen to anyone but you, Uralon's image surveys the bodies of two lean, scarlet-robed women lying on the floor.{/n} "The lot of the weak is to lay down their worthless lives to pave the way for the strong to ascend their thrones."

traits.locale_text: 「少しばかりの勝利を祝わせてやろう。真理がすでに勝利し、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Eufrates_ChampionOfChaos}強大な王者を生み出した{/d}ことを、彼女らは知らない」{n}あなた以外には見えないが、ウラロンのイメージは床に倒れている二人の痩せた緋色の衣をまとった女性の遺体を調べている。{/n}「弱者は価値のない命を投げ出して、強者が王座に就くための道を開く運命にあるってことだ」
traits.speaker: DarkApostleVision

languages.text: "Bırak da ehemmiyetsiz zaferlerinin tadını çıkarsınlar. Hakikat'in, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Eufrates_ChampionOfChaos}kudretli bir müdafi yaratarak{/d} çoktan galip geldiğinin farkında değiller." {n}Uralon'un senin dışında kimsenin göremediği imgesi; yerde yatan, kızıl cübbeli, cılız kadınların cesetlerini inceliyor.{/n} "Güçlülerin tahtına yükselmesi için zayıfların çoğunun canından olarak yol yapması gerekir."
languages.original_text: "Let them celebrate their trifling victory. Little do they know that the Truth has already triumphed, in {d|Encyclopedia:Ch4_Eufrates_ChampionOfChaos}bringing forth a mighty champion{/d}." {n}Unseen to anyone but you, Uralon's image surveys the bodies of two lean, scarlet-robed women lying on the floor.{/n} "The lot of the weak is to lay down their worthless lives to pave the way for the strong to ascend their thrones."
